resources.string: Input Screen: Enter the text you wish to be converted into a sound file into the large box and press the "Synthesize File" button to write it to memory. To look at files previously created, click the "View Files" button.
Please enter the text you want converted.
File Explorer: Tap on a file to play it. Tap and hold a file and then click the "Delete" button at bottom of screen to delete it from memory.

Media Player: Hit play for file to begin. To get the definition of a word, type the word into the "Search Word" box and click the "Define" button. To get alternate definitions, click the "Alternate" button.
